set.name: DMR-16(Promos), DMX and DMD Dragon Saga

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Those 2 creatures battle. Triple breaker Whenever a non-dragon creature would be put into the battle zone, put them into their owner's graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put a non-evolution Dragon from among them into the battle zone and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Light commands. {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, or when your last shield breaks, tap all your opponent's creatures. Those creatures don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. From among them, add one to your shields face down, and put the other into your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Darkness commands. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all other creatures. Double breaker If you have no other creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets +5000 power and has 'triple breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may discard any number of your darkness cards. For each card you discard, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand. Double breaker While you have no cards in your hand, this creature gets +6000 power and has 'Triple breaker'

property.name: Rules
property.value: Non-darkness creatures are put into the battle zone tapped. Each of your darkness creatures gets 'slayer'. (Whenever a creature that has 'slayer' battles, after the battle, destroy your opponent's creature.) Double breaker When one of your Dragons is destroyed, if this creature is in your graveyard, you may return this creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature in the battle zone, and return it to its owner's hand. Then, choose a spell in either mana zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose up to 2 non-evolution nature creatures from your mana zone that have total cost 7 or less, and put them into the battle zone. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero-If you have 3 or more fire Dragons in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all creatures that have 'blocker' from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: You may reduce the cost of your water spells by 1 for each of your Liquid People in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: While all cards in your mana zone are water, this creature gets +4000 power. Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If you have cards of all civilizations in your mana zone, you may put another card from the top of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone that have no abilities gets +5000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any creatures that have no abilities from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your Light cards put into your hand from your shields gets 'shield trigger'. While you have no shields, this creature has 'blocker'. Triple breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may have your opponent choose one of your shields instead. If you do, put that shield into your hand. (You can use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. Each turn, when this creature becomes tapped for the first time, untap it. While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. Triple breaker

card.name: Kiriko Cubic, First Model Dragon Emperor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your water Dragons. When you put this creature into the battle zone, put your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 spells. Shuffle all other revealed cards into your deck, then cast those 3 spells for no cost. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your darkness Dragons. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Then each player puts all non-darkness cards in his mana zone into his graveyard. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a non-evolution nature creature from your hand into the battle zone. Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, it attacks this creature if able. Triple breaker

card.name: Alcadeias D, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your light Dragons. Triple breaker Players can't cast spells other than light spells.

card.name: Bell Hell De Linne, Footprint Demon Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your opponent's creatures is destroyed, shuffle your deck. Then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. If it's not, your opponent chooses and discards a card from his hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if the equipped creature is tapped, flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Whenever this creature attacks or blocks or leaves the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. From among it, you may take a water spell that costs 4 or less, shuffle your deck and cast that spell for no cost. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random. Then you may put a darkness creature that costs less than the discarded card from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire Dragons. Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, he chooses 3 cards in his mana zone and puts the rest into his graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your nature Dragons. When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever this creature attacks, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Dragons in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Bg Newton Custom Panzer, Dragment Symbol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent draws cards, you may draw the same number of cards. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then, your opponent chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone and puts it into his mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other Dragons in the battle zone gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a Dragon, a non-Dragon creature and a spell and put them into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw a card. Slayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature or one of your other Dragons would be destroyed, you may put them into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. A creature equipped with this can't be attacked. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you put a dragon in the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your Humans or fire Dragons attack, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Human or non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise put it on the bottom of your deck. Dragsolution—When you put a Dragon in the battle zone, if it's not the first Dragon put into the battle zone this turn, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all non-evolution Humans and non-evolution Dragons into the battle zone. If all cards are Dragons, each of your creatures gets 'speed attacker'. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Triple breaker Dragon Evade (When this would creature leaves the battle zone, flip it to the fortress side instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a fire dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this would be destroyed, you may add a shield to your hand instead. (You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.) Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you have 3 or less shields, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a light creature would leave the battle zone, you may put a shield into your hand instead. (You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.) Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if you have 1 Shield or less, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

alternate.name: Leo the World, Zenith Heavenly Saint

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} Triple breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, if you have no shields, it stays in the battle zone instead. When you would lose the game or your opponent would win the game, you may destroy one of your non-dragheart creatures instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields and add it to your hand. Then you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. (You may use 'shield trigger' ability of a shield added put into your hand in this way.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if one of your opponent's creatures was destroyed, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your darkness creatures attacks, you may destroy one of your other creatures. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. Dragsolution—When one of your opponent's creatures is destroyed, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may destroy any number of your creatures. For each creature destroyed, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Triple breaker Dragon Evade—When this creature would leave the battle zone, if this is your only creature in the battle zone, flip it to the dragheart fortress side instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, each of your opponent's creatures gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this dragheart into the battle zone or whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may put a nature creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. Dragsolution: At the end of your turn, if the total cost of your creatures in the battle zone is 20 or more, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you summon a creature from your hand, you may put a Nature creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone. Dragsolution: At the start of your turn, if the total cost of your creatures in the battle zone is 30 or more, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon a creature from your hand, or whenever this creature attacks, you may put a nature creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a nature dragheart that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you have 3 or more creatures in the battle zone, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your light creatures attacks, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand into the battle zone. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if you have 4 or more creatures in the battle zone, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

alternate.name: Soleil Noir, Solar Eclipse Dragon Elemental

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures attacks, you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand or graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 5: When you put a creature into the battle zone that costs 3 or less, if you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature equipped with this attacks, your opponent puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard. If it's a spell, you may cast it for no cost. If you do, put it into its owner's graveyard after casting it. Dragsolution—At the end of your turn, if your opponent has 5 or more cards in his graveyard, you may flip this card to the dragheart fortress side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your water creatures attacks, your opponent puts the top card of his deck into his graveyard. If it's a spell, you may cast it for no cost. Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if your opponent has 10 or more cards in his graveyard, You may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it. If you do, put it into its owner's graveyard after casting it.

property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may cast a spell from a players graveyard for no cost. If you do, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules

property.value: Whenever one of your fire creatures attacks, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less. Dragsolution—At the start of your turn, if you have more creatures in the battle zone than your opponent, you may flip this card to the dragheart creature side and untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, you may summon a creature from your mana zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's cards that cost 4 or less in the battle zone and put it to its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Spells you cast get 'charger'. (After you cast a spell that has 'charger', put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.) Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sympathy: Liquid People(This spell costs 1 less to cast for each of your Liquid People in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1.) Return all your opponents cards in the battle zone to their owners' hands. Draw a card for each card returned to your opponents hand in this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) When another creature is destroyed, each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. Double breaker

Triple breaker If you have all civilizations in your mana zone, this creature gets 'world breaker'. (A creature that has 'world breaker' breaks all your opponent's shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your opponent attacks your fire Dragons, if you have no'Batoraio Deluxe, Passion Reversal ' in battle zone, you may put this creature from your hand to battle zone. When one of your other fire creatures battles your opponent's creatures, you may have this creature battle instead. While battling, this creature gets +5000 power. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a nature dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your fire creatures win a battle, you may draw a card. Dragsolution|At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more fire creatures in the battle zone Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures win a battle, you may draw a card. While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. Players can't summon creatures other than light creatures or cast spells other than light spells. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have 'blocker' from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature leaves, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, choose one:► Put a Victory creature or creature that costs 10 or more from your hand to battle zone.:► Search your deck. Take a Victory creature, show that creature to your opponent and add it to your hand and shuffle your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker Mana Arms 7: When this creature attacks, if you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose one:► Put a non-weapon card that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone to battle zone.:► While this creature is not equipped with a weapon,equip it with weapon that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone

property.name: Rules
property.value: While one of your fire creatures is attacking, it gets +1000 power for each of your fire cards in your graveyard. Dragsolution|At the start of your turn, if you have 6 or more fire Dragons in the battle zone and/or your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures attacks, that creature gets +3000 power for each of your fire cards in your graveyard. World breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragsolution: When the equipped creature would leave the battle zone by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or creature ability, flip this dragheart to the creature side and untap it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Triple breaker During the turn this creature was put into the battle zone, this creature can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Each turn, the first time this creature is tapped, untap it. Mana Arms 5: While this creatures battles, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +13000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, choose a player. You may destroy one of their creatures. If so, choose a non-Evolution creature other than "Magical Dragon Babelginus" in that player's Graveyard, and put it into the Battle Zone.
